resources.string: There are many variations of Passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form by injected humor. There are many variations of Passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form by injected humor.

Clipping views enables you to easily change the shape of a view. You can clip views for consistency with other design elements or to change the shape of a view in response to user input. You can clip a view to its outline area using the View.setClipToOutline() method or the android:clipToOutline attribute. Only rectangle, circle, and round rectangle outlines support clipping, as determined by the Outline.canClip() method.
